customdata:
The Covid-19 pandemic had a significant impact on the supply
situation within the supply chain in 2020.
None

One example of this is the nitric acid Verbund at the
Ludwigshafen site in Germany.

Third, due to the profile and locations of our suppliers,
our supply chain does not, from today's perspective, pose
any discernible water risks.
None

As a target figure for the Board of Executive Directors, the
Supervisory Board determined that, in accordance with
section 111(5) AktG for the second target-attainment period
after the law's entry into force, which began on January 1,
2017, the Board of Executive Directors should continue to
have at least one female member.

Integration of ESG in investments is steered by ESG teams
globally, as well as other investment professionals across
Allianz Group.

The team around the company's Data Protection Officer,
Elwira Wall, makes sure of this.

We aim to develop leaders who lead their teams with
optimism, empathy and trust, and in this way, create a
competitive advantage for BASF.
None

Consumers and companies in many countries remain restricted
in their freedom of actions for the time being due to
measures to combat the pan demic.

Net capital ex penditures decreased as a result of the
hydroelectric projects and lower shares of DB funds in
demolition work during the previous year.

For more information on this method and the results of Value
to Society, see basf.com/en/value-to-society For more
information on our sustainability tools, see basf.com/en/mea-
surement-methods For more information on value balancing
alliance e.V., see value-balancing.com

• Complete the fourth cycle of the integrated compliance
risk scoping and assessment activities as part of the
company's IRCS process in 2020(IRCS) processes.
None
None
None
None
None

We have exceeded our 2020 target, with a 50 percent cut in
2020 (2019: 37 percent).

Through our emerging consumer solutions, we have reached
over 10.1 million 6 (2019: 10.0 mn) people living on low
incomes in Asia, Africa and Latin America with affordable
microinsurance and microsavings solutions (see section
03.1.5).

We report on this and other progress in this Interim Report,
which is based on the requirements of the United Nations
Global Compact (UNGC).

In order to assess the sustainable performance of the Board
of Executive Directors, each year the Supervisory Board sets
a target agreement with the Board of Executive Directors as
a whole.
None

The themed year is intended to help to position rail as an
environmentally friendly mode of transport and thus to
achieve the objectives of the European Green Deal in the
transport sector.

Together with the 17 United Nations Sustainable Development
Goals (SDGs), these principles form the basis for the
further development of our sustainability strategies.
None
None
Project ongoing.

In addition to the products themselves, other links in the
value chain are examined: All store brand suppliers in the
Food area have to be certified under a standard recognised
by the GFSI (Global Food Safety Initiative), such as IFS
Food or the standard of the British Retail Consortium
(BRC).

For many years now, ALDI Nord has been using numerous
measures to minimise food loss and waste.

This regulates the handling of surplus food and is binding
for the ALDI companies and their business partners.
Project ongoing.
None

Total amount of greenhouse gas emissions for Scope 1 and 2
proportionately by source (in per cent, based on location-ba-
sed emissions)

The project takes into consideration the ESG Underwriting
Guidance co-developed with the United Nations Environment
Program Finance Initiative (UNEP FI) Principles for
Sustainable Insurance (PSI).
the enzyme businesses at BASF.

At ALDI Nord, 2020 was marked to a large extent by the
COVID-19 pandemic.

For instance, we established a new and dedicated function
for sustainability from 01 January 2021.

That is why we are gradually using more and more recycled
plastics for our product packaging
None
None

As a result, we have once again sharpened our focus on
climate protection.

Twice a year, the committee, which consists of 30 private
customers, comes together for ordinary meet ings.

That is why proactive engagement is integral to our ESG
strategy.

That is why proactive engagement is integral to our ESG
strategy.

Such solutions include augmented reality: At many sites, our
employees already use mobile end devices and special apps
for day-to-day tasks such as safety inspections, which
continuously improves the efficiency and quality of our
processes.

This will see a reduction from having dozens of fields to
fill in, in the current system to only five mandatory
fields: first name, last name, phone number, e-mail address
and CV upload.
None

The German Public Auditor responsible for the engagement is
Dr. Stephanie Dietz.

The headquarters or the plants are the main contacts for
this purpose.
None

Our risk exposure is mostly indirect through the risks
Allianz carries for its insured clients.

By identifying and collecting certain types of waste, we can
recycle them and generate revenues for specific waste.

We aim to publish the initial results and the resulting
measures on our websites by the end of 2021.

3) Treatment of waste from surface and waste water
treatment, cleaning of sewers and emulsion drilling. 4)
Rubble and soil from construction work are normally disposed
of at dumpsites.

Employees themselves also frequently supply valuable impetus
for lasting improvements.
Project ongoing.

Within the framework of the Circular Economy working group,
REWE Group works with other companies to focus on developing
ideas relating to the circular economy.

Since 2020, we have also been publishing all our main
production facilities on the 'Open Apparel Registry'
platform.

To calculate the EBIT of the segments, we take the BASF
Group's EBIT and deduct the EBIT of activities recognized
under Other, which are not allocated to the divisions.

For example, we see considerable opportunities in new
materials for high-end batteries and energysaving applicatio-
ns in the construction sector.

We strive to be a key player in the engagement community and
support the success of collaborative engagement initiatives-
.

In one case, our engagement aims to steer for ESG improvemen-
t and address long-term ESG risks with one such oil and gas
company.

In 2020, just like in 2019, no incidents were recorded at
-or complaints filed about -suppliers that CEWE works with.
We continued this development in 2020.

data.name: Upper Outliers

title.text:
Sentimentⓘ
Sentiment of the text, calculated using the TextBlob sentiment analysis model. Ranging from -1 (negative) to 1 (positive)
